raw_body: DIAS – J.V. RANJITHA (RANJITH) – Dearly beloved husband of Nirmala, loving and devoted father of Nishanthi and Ramindra, father-in-law of Nalaka, darling grandfather of Anaaya, Devain and Kayen, brother of Sunethra and late Irani, brother-in-law of Daya Tissera, Keerthi Peiris, Malcom and Jayanthi Dias, Shayama and Lakshman Gunawardena, Dinoo and Susiri Jayawardena, loving son of late Percy and late Mebel Dias and son-in-law of late Allen and late Pearl Dias. Remains lie at residence No. 873, Negombo Road, Mabola, Wattala. Cortege leaves residence on Tuesday 10th October 2023 at 3.30 p.m. for Burial at Our Lady of Good Health Church, Mabola, Wattala. 064471
